extendedInfo.description: Monitor California ISO real-time power grid conditions, receive alerts and track calendar events with this free application.  ISO Today makes our top web features available at your touch. Featuresâ¢	View real-time power supply and demand plus follow renewable energy outputâ¢	Receive grid alerts and know when conservation is neededâ¢	Add ISO meetings and events to your calendar and get notified of updatesAbout the California ISOAs the nonprofit publicâbenefit company ensuring the reliability of most of Californiaâs highâvoltage power grid, the California Independent System Operator Corporation (ISO) is helping advance a smarter, cleaner, more reliable energy future. The ISO operates the Westâs only competitive energy market that balances supply with demand and is a key platform to achieve clean energy goals.

reviews.title: Errors fixed but...
reviews.comment: Yesterdays renewables still require browser load. Still not seeing relevant teaching tool potential with scenario bubbles at certain thresholds, etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closes.
reviews.comment: Force closes. I work in power generation and thought this would be a useful tool. Guess not.
reviews.author: evan derouen

reviews.comment: Won\'t load on samsung galaxy s3 after latest firmware updates.  Also why does it need contact info and send email permissions.
reviews.author: Christopher Sutter

reviews.comment: Thank you for a prompt and quick response to the app issues.  5 stars now for a great app that serves its purpose, especially to those of us that are in the utility industry here in California.\tOne star for now since the app is not working on my HTC One X once it updated to Jellybean.  Previously the app worked great on ICS...  Currently I still get notifications but when I open the app to see what they are about, the program unexpectedly closes when you click on anything in the app... I work in the utility industry so this app would be helpful.
reviews.author: Matthew Hessemer

reviews.title: Totally nonfunctional
reviews.comment: On Galaxy S4, app crashes  immediately after launch when attempting to access any function.  Please fix; would be willing to purchase if done correctly.
reviews.author: Pete Golda

reviews.title: Force Closes
reviews.comment: Used to work.Hope you can fix it. I enjoy watching the fluctuations.
reviews.author: Lu Johnson

reviews.comment: Forces close.  First day I got it worked since then crap.  Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Lauri McKindley

reviews.title: Update seems to work okay now.
reviews.comment: Locked up my phone 3 times in a row. I finally gave up and uninstalled this worthless app. *7/1/13 UPDATE* Patch seems to be working okay now. Thank you to app developer for quick response. Tentative upgrade to 4 stars from 1.
reviews.author: Russ Lofing

reviews.title: Force close...
reviews.comment: Any phone I use I get force close. App can not be used at all.
reviews.author: johnathan mcfadden

reviews.comment: Force closes on every function. Galaxy S3
